pages.text: $(bgreen)Fume Shroom$() was producing yeast spores for a bakery before, until it heard about a great opportunity blasting zombies. Now it's really making a difference.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)medium range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)fume$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy. Fume can $()hits through all enemies$(). $(bred)It will sleep at daytime$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)fume each tick$() which last several seconds.
